title: Nintendo Indie World August 2020 Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
Tim, Greg, Blessing, and Andy react to the latest Nintendo Indie World.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys welcome back to another kind of funny live reaction this time too uh nintendo indie world for august 18th 2020 as always i'm tim getty's joined by one of the coolest dudes in video games greg miller i can't wait to see zelda i can't wait to see a new mario i can't wait to see dk come out and throw a barrel yeah i'm very happy we have your energy today greg uh we also have the new face of video games blessing at aoia junior show me smash it's a simple request nintendo show this kid's smash where where is smash brothers he's just oh man and then of course we have the nitro rifle andy cortez i can't wait for a new mario i can't wait for dk to come out of a barrel throw a barrel he throws barrels yeah i'll tell you right now there's no barrel that could hold donkey kong all right [Laughter] ask the real at questions eight in the morning all right nobody's [ __ ] such a great question and in dong kong country when when uh when donkey kong finds one of the barrels and say dk
